analyzed: eka bījī puggalaḥ eka bīji tā niyataḥ ti
translated: the one-seeder is certain to be a one-seeder.”

original: Hañci so ekabījī, tena vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci saḥ ekabījī tena vata re vattabbe
eka bījī puggalaḥ eka bīji tā niyataḥ ti
translated: the one-seeder is certain to be a one-seeder.”
The discussion of the one-seeder is finished.
